name: Pulpmon
description:
Pulpmon is small turn-based monster fighting game. It's currently called Pulpmon! The game is completely playable up to the end of route 1. Let me know what you think in the Discord! If it catches a lot of interest I will surely continue building it!

Features:
  • Catch Pulpmons.
  • Train Pulpmons.
  • Fight wild pulpmons.
  • Battle Trainers.
  • Use the crank in the Dex to scroll through the Pulpmons!.
  • Talk to some rando villagers!
  • Collect all the Pulpmons!
